text: Dughiar kam, Josua Gilgalɨn danganim aghuigha itima, Gibeonia a bagha zuamɨrama akam amaga ghaze, “O gumazir ekiam, e ian ingangarir gumaziba, e nɨn apengan iti. Ezɨ nɨ e ateghan markɨ, nɨ zuamɨra izɨ en akuragh! Amorian atrivir danganir mɨghsɨabar itiba uan mɨdorozir gumaziba isafuragh, izighirɨ e mɨsoghasa.”
